S.FORM: == Ye-low-ni-mi-s.pow-si "耶羅尼米斯·波希 == 耶羅尼米斯·波希(荷蘭語:Jheronimus Bosch,荷蘭語發音: (je'ɾoːnimʏs 'bɔs),1452 ·波希(荷蘭語:Hiëronymus Bosch,荷蘭語: (ɦijeː'roːnimʏz 'bɔs) )或耶倫·波希(荷蘭語:Jeroen Bosch),原名耶羅尼米斯·范阿肯(荷蘭語:Jheronimus van Aken,荷蘭語發音: (je'ɾoːnimʏs vɑn 'aːkə )), . Ye-low-ni-mi-s.pow-si "kamu nu Hw-lan, Jheronimus Bosch, Helan a nipangiha " (je'ɾoːnimʏs 'bɔs), i 1452 a mihcaan katukuh i 1516 a mih can 8 a bulad" singangan aca tu ci Si-ya-low-ni-mi-s. Helan a kamu Hiëronymus Bosch,Helan a kamu:(ɦijeː'roːnimʏz 'bɔs) "tingil anucaay" anucaay Ye-lun.pow-si " "Helan a kamu Jeroen Bosch", uyaanay a ngangan Ye-low-n-mi-s.han-a-ken "He-lan a kamu "Jheronimus van Aken", He-lan a pangiha, (je'ɾoːnimʏs vɑn 'aːkə ) ,He-lan 15 katukuh 16 lasubu a mihcaan a nikulitan kapahay nu mikulitay. yadah ku nitudengay ilul atu caay katineng tu balucu' nu tademaw. ci Po-si a satang, pangkiw u tademaw pangkiw u aadupan tuwaca u kikay ku waway a patahkal tu katal nu tademaw. malawlaw ku nikulitan niza, talakaw ku nipabaluhay misanga', u pizateng, yadah ku mahicahicaay mahizaay u bacu. nu uzuma caay kahapinang katinengan. cu Po-si u i 20 lasubu a mihcaan u palingatuay tu tatenga'ay a nizatengan. nikauzipan ·范阿肯(Jheronimus van Aken), Bosch(荷蘭文,音近英文Boss), El Bosco. zuma a uyaan a ngangan ci Ye-low-ni-mi-s.ban-a-ken "Jheronimus van Aken" u imi "A-hen tayniay a tademaw". zumaay a nikulitan ciza a ngangan Bosch "u He-lan a cudad, ngiha macapi tu nu A-mi-lika Boss" sa, miala tu kalecuhan niza a kakitizaan S-hay-al-tu-heng-po-si. i S-pang-ya a cudadan pangangan han ci El Bosco. ci Po-si-lecahan i mikulitay a lumaan, u wama wina niza u He-lan atu Te-kow a tademawan. hatu I Hay-al-tu-tin-po-si amauzip ciniza, uyni I 15 lasubu a mihcaan itawya u Pu-la-pang nu "ayzaay timulan He-lan" cacay u makengkengay a tukay. 1463 a mihcaan hawsa, pakala tu 13 a mihcaan hakay namaazih niza ku tizaay nu pahaceng u satebuc. cay aka tenes hawsa u singanganay tu ciniza tu mutesekay nu mikulita, tuwaca namaala ku patudud nu tauay a kanatal. 1488 a mihcaan micumud ciniza tu maliya caekakaan a sakaput, uyza u malekecay tu singku a putuput, 40 ku tademaw ci S-hay-al-to-heng-po-si u sitatungusay tu tademaw, atu Ow-co kasa kakitizaay tu 7000 kakatuud nu sakaput a tademaw. u wayway風格 uyni a nikulitan calekay ku pabaway a kulit, atu laylay ni Ba-lan-te-s, a wayway, misakapah tu lamedeng nu hekal nu tademaw caay kakapah ku nalimaan masazuma caay kalecad. " . katukuhi tu kabalakian, Pow-su a wayway masumaday tu, misumad u mitudung tu tabakiay, micapi tu sasanaulan nu tademaw tu sapaazih. tungusay a nisangaan u "tay-ce-kwan a ciwlu" "Christ Crowned with Thorns". ci Pow-si caay ka i pikulatan amisulit nu demiad tizasaca izunma a nikulitan pangangnan "zuma sacaay ku nu uzip anipangangan", u kamu amin, imahini maahapinang tu namakay lima ni kulitan ni Po-si, 25 tu dada' a kakulitan. ". Si-pang-ya kow-wang ci Bey-li tusa lasubu a mihcaan i Pow-si mapatay zikuz mahaminay tu masinga' ku nikulitan niza, namahiza imahini Si-pang-ya Ma-te-li a Pu-la a piazihan tu nikulitan masinga' tu ku sayadahay a nikulitan ni Pow-si, pasu "sakapahay ni kauzip nu tademaw". sazikuzay tu amihcaan Ba-lan-te-s mutesekay nu mikulitay balaki Pi-te.Pu-le-ce-al malilid ni Pow-si, zuma a nikulitan a waway masasengi tu ni Pow-say, mahiniay 1562 a mihcaan tu "makademec tu nikapatay".

== Ye-low-ni-mi-s.pow-si "耶羅尼米斯·波希 == 耶羅尼米斯·波希(荷蘭語:Jheronimos Bosch,荷蘭語發音: (je'ɾoːnimʏs 'bɔs),1452 ·波希(荷蘭語:Hiëronymos Bosch,荷蘭語: (ɦijeː'roːnimʏz 'bɔs) )或耶倫·波希(荷蘭語:Jeroen Bosch),原名耶羅尼米斯·范阿肯(荷蘭語:Jheronimos van Aken,荷蘭語發音: (je'ɾoːnimʏs vɑn 'aːkə )), . Ye-low-ni-mi-s.pow-si "kamo no Hw-lan, Jheronimos Bosch, Helan a nipangiha " (je'ɾoːnimʏs 'bɔs), i 1452 a mihcaan katokoh i 1516 a mih can 8 a bolad" singangan aca to ci Si-ya-low-ni-mi-s. Helan a kamo Hiëronymos Bosch,Helan a kamo:(ɦijeː'roːnimʏz 'bɔs) "tingil anocaay" anocaay Ye-lon.pow-si " "Helan a kamo Jeroen Bosch", oyaanay a ngangan Ye-low-n-mi-s.han-a-ken "He-lan a kamo "Jheronimos van Aken", He-lan a pangiha, (je'ɾoːnimʏs vɑn 'aːkə ) ,He-lan 15 katokoh 16 lasobo a mihcaan a nikolitan kapahay no mikolitay. yadah ko nitodengay ilol ato caay katineng to baloco' no tademaw. ci Po-si a satang, pangkiw o tademaw pangkiw o aadopan towaca o kikay ko waway a patahkal to katal no tademaw. malawlaw ko nikolitan niza, talakaw ko nipabalohay misanga', o pizateng, yadah ko mahicahicaay mahizaay o baco. no ozoma caay kahapinang katinengan. co Po-si o i 20 lasobo a mihcaan o palingatoay to tatenga'ay a nizatengan. nikaozipan ·范阿肯(Jheronimos van Aken), Bosch(荷蘭文,音近英文Boss), El Bosco. zoma a oyaan a ngangan ci Ye-low-ni-mi-s.ban-a-ken "Jheronimos van Aken" o imi "A-hen tayniay a tademaw". zomaay a nikolitan ciza a ngangan Bosch "o He-lan a codad, ngiha macapi to no A-mi-lika Boss" sa, miala to kalecohan niza a kakitizaan S-hay-al-to-heng-po-si. i S-pang-ya a codadan pangangan han ci El Bosco. ci Po-si-lecahan i mikolitay a lomaan, o wama wina niza o He-lan ato Te-kow a tademawan. hato I Hay-al-to-tin-po-si amaozip ciniza, oyni I 15 lasobo a mihcaan itawya o Po-la-pang no "ayzaay timolan He-lan" cacay o makengkengay a tokay. 1463 a mihcaan hawsa, pakala to 13 a mihcaan hakay namaazih niza ko tizaay no pahaceng o sateboc. cay aka tenes hawsa o singanganay to ciniza to motesekay no mikolita, towaca namaala ko patodod no taoay a kanatal. 1488 a mihcaan micomod ciniza to maliya caekakaan a sakapot, oyza o malekecay to singko a potopot, 40 ko tademaw ci S-hay-al-to-heng-po-si o sitatongosay to tademaw, ato Ow-co kasa kakitizaay to 7000 kakatood no sakapot a tademaw. o wayway風格 oyni a nikolitan calekay ko pabaway a kolit, ato laylay ni Ba-lan-te-s, a wayway, misakapah to lamedeng no hekal no tademaw caay kakapah ko nalimaan masazoma caay kalecad. " . katokohi to kabalakian, Pow-so a wayway masomaday to, misomad o mitodong to tabakiay, micapi to sasanaolan no tademaw to sapaazih. tongosay a nisangaan o "tay-ce-kwan a ciwlo" "Christ Crowned with Thorns". ci Pow-si caay ka i pikolatan amisolit no demiad tizasaca izonma a nikolitan pangangnan "zoma sacaay ko no ozip anipangangan", o kamo amin, imahini maahapinang to namakay lima ni kolitan ni Po-si, 25 to dada' a kakolitan. ". Si-pang-ya kow-wang ci Bey-li tosa lasobo a mihcaan i Pow-si mapatay zikoz mahaminay to masinga' ko nikolitan niza, namahiza imahini Si-pang-ya Ma-te-li a Po-la a piazihan to nikolitan masinga' to ko sayadahay a nikolitan ni Pow-si, paso "sakapahay ni kaozip no tademaw". sazikozay to amihcaan Ba-lan-te-s motesekay no mikolitay balaki Pi-te.Po-le-ce-al malilid ni Pow-si, zoma a nikolitan a waway masasengi to ni Pow-say, mahiniay 1562 a mihcaan to "makademec to nikapatay".
